The Golkonda Biryani Experience.name: Non-Vegetarian with Prawns
The Golkonda Biryani Experience.description: Auburn with layers of dry fruits & rice, flavored forever—the ultimate prawn experience with the Nawabi Dum Biryani! Entices the eloquence of royal grandeur. Gently cooked with saffron & spice, it satisfies every seafood lover’s appetite.

The Golkonda Biryani Experience.name: Non-Vegetarian
The Golkonda Biryani Experience.description: A supreme Nawabi Dum Biryani handcrafted to recreate authentic flavors. Steamed to perfection with aromatic long grain basmati rice, richly marinated meat, saffron & spices. Paired with Mirchi Ka Salan & Raita. The secret lies in the nuances of its blend.

The Golkonda Biryani Experience.name: Vegetarian
The Golkonda Biryani Experience.description: Inspired by the traditional Nawabi recipe of Hyderabad. Basmati rice cooked on dum with saffron, select spices & vegetables, served with Mirchi Ka Salan & Raita.
